description: Redesign the CLI interface with structured layout: header at top, streaming messages in middle, context status, and enhanced input with command/model selection.

userStories.title: Fix Header to show provider and actual model from config
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see the correct model and provider in the header.
acceptanceCriteria: Model comes from config.defaultModel or --model flag, not hardcoded
App component accepts initialModel prop and passes to ChatProvider
userStories.notes: BUG: Currently shows hardcoded 'claude-3-5-sonnet', no provider

userStories.title: Wire TextInput to agent for LLM calls
userStories.description: As a user, I want my input to be sent to the LLM and see streaming responses.
acceptanceCriteria: handleInputSubmit calls agent.runStream with user message
Final response added to messages via addMessage
isThinking set true during LLM call, false when done
userStories.notes: BUG: Input adds to UI state but never calls agent

userStories.title: Create Header component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see a header at the top of the CLI so I know which agent/session I'm in.
acceptanceCriteria: Header displays agent name 'tiny-agent' with emoji
Shows current model name on the right side
Uses Ink Box with borderStyle for visual separation
userStories.notes: Implemented with round border, cyan color, model display

userStories.title: Create MessageList component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see messages in a scrollable area so I can follow the conversation.
acceptanceCriteria: Accepts messages array prop with role and content
User messages show 'You:' prefix in green
Assistant messages show 'Assistant:' prefix in cyan
Uses flexGrow=1 to fill available space
userStories.notes: Uses Message component for rendering, flexGrow=1

userStories.title: Create StreamingText component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see AI responses stream in real-time so I can follow the agent's output.
acceptanceCriteria: Accepts text prop that updates incrementally
Shows blinking cursor at end while streaming

userStories.title: Create ThinkingIndicator component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see a thinking indicator before streaming starts.

userStories.title: Create ContextStatus component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see current context/token usage so I know when approaching limits.
acceptanceCriteria: Uses compact number formatting (k for thousands)

userStories.title: Create TextInput component
userStories.description: As a user, I want a text input at the bottom to type my prompts.
acceptanceCriteria: Uses Ink's useInput hook for keyboard handling
Calls onSubmit prop when Enter pressed
Accepts disabled prop to prevent input during AI response
userStories.notes: Full cursor support, backspace, arrow keys, escape

userStories.title: Create CommandMenu component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to quickly access commands when typing '/'.
acceptanceCriteria: Accepts filter prop to filter commands by prefix
Highlights selected command with arrow keys
Calls onSelect prop when Enter pressed
Calls onClose prop when Escape pressed
userStories.notes: 5 commands, arrow key navigation, filter support

userStories.title: Create ModelPicker component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to switch models during a session.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows list of available models from config
Indicates current active model with checkmark
Calls onSelect prop with selected model

userStories.title: Create ChatLayout container component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a main layout component that orchestrates all sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Uses Box with flexDirection='column' and height='100%'
Header at top with fixed height
TextInput at bottom with fixed height

userStories.title: Create ChatContext for state management
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a React context to manage chat state across components.

userStories.title: Integrate ChatLayout into App
userStories.description: As a user, I want the new chat layout to appear in interactive mode.
acceptanceCriteria: Pass messages and callbacks to ChatLayout
Layout visible in interactive chat mode
userStories.notes: ChatApp component uses ChatLayout, wrapped in providers

userStories.title: Wire command menu to TextInput
userStories.description: As a user, I want the command menu to appear when I type '/'.
acceptanceCriteria: TextInput detects '/' prefix and shows CommandMenu
userStories.notes: Integrated in TextInput, filter by prefix

userStories.title: Implement /model command with ModelPicker
userStories.description: As a user, I want /model command to open model picker.
acceptanceCriteria: Selecting model updates session model immediately
userStories.notes: handleModelSelect in ChatApp, confirmation message added

userStories.title: Display tool usage inline in messages
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see tool usage in the message stream.
acceptanceCriteria: Tool calls display inline with streaming content
Shows tool name with gear icon
Shows key parameters in dim text
userStories.notes: InlineToolOutput component shows gear icon, args in dim color, results inline
